heif.boxes

Class PixelAspectRatioBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • heif.boxes.Box
      • heif.boxes.PixelAspectRatioBox

  • public class PixelAspectRatioBox
extends Box
    Represents the pasp (Pixel Aspect Ratio Box). Defines the relative width and height of a pixel (square vs non-square pixels). * Refer to ISO/IEC 14496-12:2015 documentation in Page 157.

      • logBoxInfo

        public void logBoxInfo()
        Description copied from class: Box
        Logs the box hierarchy and internal entry data at the debug level.

        It provides a visual representation of the box's HEIF/ISO-BMFF structure. It is intended for tree traversal and file inspection during development and degugging if required.

        Overrides:
        logBoxInfo in class Box
